ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin anyways?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah the lute quest, possibly one of the best quests in the game. You can seemingly do this an inifinte number of times, as one time when I was 3 plat short of
ygData.messageBody:
Ah the lute quest, possibly one of the best quests in the game. You can
seemingly do this an inifinte number of times, as one time when I was 3
plat short of buying a needed item I just went and did this quest by
going from store to store buying up every spiderling silk possible. I've
done it atleast 30 times, so its a quest to keep in the back of your
mind. In other towns there are quests bards can do, and if you hunt
enough orcs/"give" stuff to other guildmasters they will give you
quests, though none of them are as good as the bard one.

"Catherine M. Campbell" wrote:
>
> From: "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...>
>
> Greetings all, I am the wood-elf Kendrin, bard of the 4th rank, in Kelethin.
>
> I have a question regarding the quest given by Sylia Windlehands -- how
> many times can you do it? Every time I talk to her (hoping to get another
> quest) she asks me for the spiderling silks. Having done this quest 3 or 4
> times, I can only ask -- how many lutes do they have there that need strings?
>
> Are there other quests in Kelethin that a bard can do, aside from offering
> to locate people's corpses for them?
>
> Kendrin
> (Tunare)
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
